name: ...sans sanitizer
description:
There was once a  bacterium that had a good life... until a new experimental hand sanitizer was poured into their petri dish! The sanitizer was deadly to all kinds of bacteria, but luckily our hero quickly adapted and gained a new AIR DASH!(hold down mouse button to aim, release to fire) But can they make it out alive?

In an interview with Channel 19 after the events of the game, the skilled bacterium was asked what would be included in their "perfect world".  They said:

(Bacturesh) "wohfw pihpaifbh pa uiheip einf."

(English) "I would keep everything, sans sanitizer."

This game was made in under 4 hours for the MashUp Game Jam 2, with the theme of "Unconventional Means".

It fits that theme because our hero can't platform normally, so he has found an unusual way to get around.
